Eva's Knight Lionel Hunter:
The Krofin race here is a colony of Queen Krosha, the greatest of all Krofin queens.
Queen Krosha escaped from the giants' annihilation and built a shelter on a small island in Innadril. Queen Krosha decided to put all of her race into hibernation for survival.
It seems that those Krofins have recently come out of hibernation. If I'm right, something terrible is to happen soon.
